p: The clinical records and magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) studies of dogs diagnosed with MUO were reviewed. Dogs with prior neurologic insult or history of seizures were excluded. Seizures were classified as early symptomatic (ESS) if they occurred within 3 months of the acute episode of meningoencephalitis. Post‚Äêencephalitic epilepsy (PE) was defined as recurrent seizures following that initial period with no other clinical signs of possible relapse.
